item.title: Chris Rea - Driving Home for Christmas - Key of A - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Driving Home for Christmas by Chris Rea from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: A, Bm, C♯m7, D, E7, Em, F♯m, G.

item.title: Chris Rea - The Road to Hell - Key of Am - BruderMaister
item.description: Play along video for the song The Road to Hell by Chris Rea from the channel BruderMaister. Chords used in the song: Am, B, C, Dm, E7, Fadd9, G.
